-- | Illumina NGS data processing
--   
@package pipes-illumina
@version 0.1.0.0

module Pipes.Illumina
bclBgzfProducer :: MonadIO m => [Handle] -> Producer (ByteString, ByteString) m ()
filterProducer :: Handle -> Producer Bool IO ()
locsProducer :: Handle -> Producer (Float, Float) IO ()
bciProducer :: Handle -> Producer (Int, Int) IO ()

module Pipes.NextSeq
data Cluster
Cluster :: !ByteString -> !ByteString -> !Float -> !Float -> !Bool -> !Int -> !Int -> Cluster
sq :: Cluster -> !ByteString
qual :: Cluster -> !ByteString
xCoord :: Cluster -> !Float
yCoord :: Cluster -> !Float
passedFilter :: Cluster -> !Bool
lane :: Cluster -> !Int
tile :: Cluster -> !Int
nextSeqProducer :: FilePath -> Producer Cluster IO ()
